comments.body:
ISC is functionally equivalent to the simplified BSD and MIT licenses according to [wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISC_license). 

Please remove `license_family` if BSD or MIT are not good options here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@  home: https://github.com/m-click/requests_pkcs12
  license: ISC
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'This library adds PKCS#12 support to the Python requests library.'

comments.body:
I opened a PR upstream to add the license to the source distribution. 

c.f.: m-click/requests_pkcs12#6

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@  license: ISC
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'This library adds PKCS#12 support to the Python requests library.'
